title: Interest group influences narrow issues most

content.question: An interest group would likely have the greatest influence on policy matters involving

choices.label: narrow issues, only a few interest groups, and technical information
major constitutional questions about civil rights and liberties
areas in which members of Congress have considerable expertise and commitment

content.answer: narrow issues, only a few interest groups, and technical information

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
